fields.name: interval
fields.description: Interval in seconds to trigger the Gumloop flow.

fields.name: Frequency
fields.description: Frequency of summary execution: 'daily' for once a day at flowTime, or 'hourly:X' for every X hours (e.g., 'hourly:4').

fields.name: flowTime
fields.description: Time to trigger the Gumloop flow daily (only if Frequency is 'daily').

fields.name: userId
fields.description: User ID for the Gumloop API request.

fields.name: flowId
fields.description: The saved item ID for the Gumloop flow to be triggered.

fields.name: pageSize
fields.description: Number of records to retrieve from Screenpipe per page for structured extraction. Increase this value if using audio.

fields.name: customPrompt
fields.default: You are an AI assistant tasked with extracting structured information from screen data (OCR). Analyze the following screen data and extract relevant information about my daily activity.
fields.description: Custom prompt for the AI assistant that will be used to extract information from the screen data.

fields.name: windowName
fields.description: Filter by specific window name in screen data (e.g., 'gmail', 'slack', etc.).

fields.name: appName
fields.description: Filter by specific application name in screen data (e.g., 'Chrome', 'Visual Studio Code', etc.).

fields.name: contentType
fields.description: Type of content to analyze: 'ocr', 'audio', or 'all'.
